description: Describes one or more Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP storage virtual machines (SVMs).

parameters.name: StorageVirtualMachineIds
parameters.description: Enter the ID of one or more SVMs that you want to view. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Enter a filter name:value pair to view a select set of SVMs. (dict) --- A filter used to restrict the results of describe calls for Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP storage virtual machines (SVMs). You can use multiple filters to return results that meet all applied filter requirements. Name (string) --- The name for this filter. Values (list) --- The values of the filter. These are all the values for any of the applied filters. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The values of the filter. These are all the values for any of the applied filters.

nested_items.name: StorageVirtualMachines
nested_items.description: Returned after a successful DescribeStorageVirtualMachines operation, describing each SVM.

nested_items.name: ActiveDirectoryConfiguration
nested_items.description: Describes the Microsoft Active Directory configuration to which the SVM is joined, if applicable.

nested_items.name: NetBiosName
nested_items.description: The NetBIOS name of the AD computer object to which the SVM is joined.

nested_items.name: SelfManagedActiveDirectoryConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the self-managed Microsoft Active Directory (AD) directory to which the Windows File Server or ONTAP storage virtual machine (SVM) instance is joined.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The fully qualified domain name of the self-managed AD directory.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnitDistinguishedName
nested_items.description: The fully qualified distinguished name of the organizational unit within the self-managed AD directory to which the Windows File Server or ONTAP storage virtual machine (SVM) instance is joined.

nested_items.name: FileSystemAdministratorsGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the domain group whose members have administrative privileges for the FSx file system.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: The user name for the service account on your self-managed AD domain that FSx uses to join to your AD domain.

nested_items.name: DnsIps
nested_items.description: A list of up to three IP addresses of DNS servers or domain controllers in the self-managed AD directory.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the resource was created, in seconds (since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z), also known as Unix time.

nested_items.name: Endpoints
nested_items.description: The endpoints that are used to access data or to manage the SVM using the NetApp ONTAP CLI, REST API, or NetApp CloudManager. They are the Iscsi, Management, Nfs, and Smb endpoints.

nested_items.name: DNSName
nested_items.description: The file system's DNS name. You can mount your file system using its DNS name.

nested_items.name: IpAddresses
nested_items.description: The SVM endpoint's IP addresses.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Management
nested_items.description: An endpoint for managing SVMs using the NetApp ONTAP CLI, NetApp ONTAP API, or NetApp CloudManager.

nested_items.name: DNSName
nested_items.description: The file system's DNS name. You can mount your file system using its DNS name.

nested_items.name: IpAddresses
nested_items.description: The SVM endpoint's IP addresses.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DNSName
nested_items.description: The file system's DNS name. You can mount your file system using its DNS name.

nested_items.name: IpAddresses
nested_items.description: The SVM endpoint's IP addresses.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DNSName
nested_items.description: The file system's DNS name. You can mount your file system using its DNS name.

nested_items.name: IpAddresses
nested_items.description: The SVM endpoint's IP addresses.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FileSystemId
nested_items.description: The globally unique ID of the file system, assigned by Amazon FSx.

nested_items.name: Lifecycle
nested_items.description: Describes the SVM's lifecycle status.
CREATED - The SVM is fully available for use.
CREATING - Amazon FSx is creating the new SVM.
DELETING - Amazon FSx is deleting an existing SVM.
FAILED - Amazon FSx was unable to create the SVM.
MISCONFIGURED - The SVM is in a failed but recoverable state.
PENDING - Amazon FSx has not started creating the SVM.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the SVM, if provisioned.

nested_items.name: ResourceARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a given resource. ARNs uniquely identify Amazon Web Services resources. We require an ARN when you need to specify a resource unambiguously across all of Amazon Web Services. For more information, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: StorageVirtualMachineId
nested_items.description: The SVM's system generated unique ID.

nested_items.name: Subtype
nested_items.description: Describes the SVM's subtype.

nested_items.name: UUID
nested_items.description: The SVM's UUID (universally unique identifier).

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of Tag values, with a maximum of 50 elements.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the TagKey, the name of the tag. Tag keys must be unique for the resource to which they are attached.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value that specifies the TagValue, the value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key-value pair in a tag set of finances : April and also of payroll : April.

nested_items.name: LifecycleTransitionReason
nested_items.description: Describes why the SVM lifecycle state changed.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A detailed error message.

nested_items.name: RootVolumeSecurityStyle
nested_items.description: The security style of the root volume of the SVM.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: (Optional) Opaque pagination token returned from a previous operation (String). If present, this token indicates from what point you can continue processing the request, where the previous NextToken value left off.
